availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Champ T. Kennaday (Hopkins/ Caldwell Co. farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County and Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Edmundson Kennaday. Father of John B. Kennaday, William Kennaday, James Kennaday, Champ T. Kennaday, Joseph Kennaday, Dorothea Kennaday, Margaret Kennaday, Sarah Kennaday, and Frances Kennaday. Married to Rachel Holeman Kennaday in Princeton, Kentucky, on January 6, 1865. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 169A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Tennesee District p. 419B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Births, 1853, p.4.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546374.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administrators Bonds, 1863-1878, p. 297.
